title: Work Experience - (Just a few questions)
body:
Hello Rioters or whom I may concern,

I was struggling to think of Work Experience that I want to do and I realized I love graphic design,coding (not much experience) and gaming I thought of my favourite game, League of Legends. I was wondering if The Sydney Riot team did any work experience for school students? hopefully the answer is yes, If so could you please inform me on how i could apply for a role at riot for a week and also if i could learn about game developing design and also even getting to know marketing. also if they was a way to apply could i be informed on what the id need to do like a application or sending the friendly staff an email.

Thanks Greatly, Ben.
Riot Games.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Unfortunately Riot Games does not currently offer work experience positions, however you could check out the following links for information regarding careers with Riot Games and their Internship Program for when you're a little older :)

* [Riot Games Careers](http://www.riotgames.com/careers)
* [Riot Games Internship Program](http://www.riotgames.com/internship-program)
